snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes Gizmodo and People magazine on Yahoo's new chief, a bionic eye that restores some vision to the blind, and why...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes Gizmodo and People magazine on Yahoo's new chief, a bionic eye that restores some vision to the blind, and why Steve Wozniak's backpack weighs 50 pounds.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Two Takes on Marissa Mayer, Wozniak's Gear, and a Bionic Eye
